EmailTemplate.name: Test New Template Email User
EmailTemplate.subject: Test New User Template Message
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.FirstName}, Thank you for using CIMI! This is an email to test the workflow functionality. Your user name in CIMI is {!User.Username}. We have your email address as {!User.Email}. Additionally, we may communicate information about your CIMI account to an authorized email account ( {!User.Approved_Contact__c} ) Please email help@nctsn.com for technical support.
Thank you and welcome to CIMI! Kelsey Willett kelsey.willett@duke.edu CIMI Adminstrator
